Entries.Potat_Crash: I have explored many tiny planets, but I've never come across any sweet potatoes in space.. Very curious.
Entries.Introduction: Ah, yes. The stars talked about your arrival, @.#$e#However, you don't have to listen to the stars, your fate is ultimately in your own hands.
Entries.accept_868: Ah... an arctic shard.#$b#A most powerful substance and potently infused with the element of ice.#$b#I'll take it, if you don't mind.#$b#...#$b#...Erm...You're still here. Oh. You want something?#$b#...Take this.
Entries.MovieInvitation: Hmm... I suppose I could accompany you... yes. Once you've arrived, I will appear. See you there.
Entries.Mon: Ah, yes. I have seen many things during my travels through space, @.#$e#If I were to tell you, there could be grave consequences.
Entries.Tue: If you have nothing important on your mind, I'm afraid it has to wait. I have much work to do.
Entries.Tue4: I trust you enough to allow you in my basement. Treat what you find there with respect.
Entries.Wed: It takes years of study to understand the language of the elementals.#$e#To actually speak their language requires a lifetime of devoted effort.#$e#Now, if you'll excuse me...
Entries.Thu: There are many mysteries around us. You must be patient if you wish to discover them.
Entries.Thu10: You mustn't tell anyone... but I have reason to believe that one of the locals is actually my daughter...#$e#I could be mistaken... It's rare, but it does happen.
Entries.Fri: I believe the townsfolk are afraid of me.#$e#It is unfortunate, but I suppose it is human to be afraid of the unknown.
Entries.Fri6: I was married, long ago. After my wife and I split, she began flying around the countryside, cursing everything she saw.#$e#It's not a very mature way to express one's anger.
Entries.Sat: Beware, you are standing above a potent magical field.#$e#I placed my spaceship here on purpose, you know.
Entries.Sat2: Have you made any headway with the forest spirits?
Entries.Sun: I sometimes observe the local villagers in secret.#$e#I am hoping to find a fellow space  and time enthusiast. Some day I will leave earth again, but my arcane pursuits must continue.
